p: The EEMLR and EEQGL markedly preserved the erythrocyte membrane against denaturation stimulated by the hypotonic solution in the analysis of membrane stabilization function shown in Fig. 4. EEMLR uncovers RBC 's protection against the negative impact of a hypotonic solution at 500, 250 and 125 μg/ml were 53.6567 ± 0.002, 45.6965 ± 0.0029 and 36.492 ± 0.0025 compared with positive control 69.5771 ± 0.0050, 57.8855 ± 0.0219 and 43.2089 ± 0.006 at the same dosages. On the other hand, EEQGL showed 36.990 ± 0.0029, 31.8407 ± 0.0025% and 26.6169 ± 0.0007% inhibition of hypotonic solution-induced hemolysis at the previous corresponding dosages.
